shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables the local snapshot upload feature.
Enables or disables local snapshot upload.

p.codeblock: virtual int enableContentInspectEx(bool enabled, const media::ContentInspectConfig &config, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int enableContentInspectEx(boolean enabled, ContentInspectConfig config, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: This method allows you to capture and upload snapshots from multiple video streams. Once enabled, the SDK captures and uploads snapshots of the local user's video based on the module type and frequency you set in . After the upload is complete, the Agora server sends a callback notification to your application server via HTTPS and uploads all snapshots to a third-party cloud storage service.

When enabled, the SDK captures and uploads snapshots of the local user's video based on the module type and frequency set in . After uploading, the Agora server sends a callback notification to your app server via HTTPS and uploads all snapshots to a third-party cloud storage service.
section.note: Before calling this method, ensure that the local snapshot upload feature is enabled in the Agora Console.
Before calling this method, make sure you have contacted technical support to enable the local snapshot upload service.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method is applicable in multi-channel scenarios.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the local snapshot upload feature:
: Enable.
: Disable.
Configuration for snapshot and upload. See .

Whether to enable local snapshot upload:
: Enable local snapshot upload.
: Disable local snapshot upload.
Configuration parameters for snapshot upload. See .
